Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Donate \Do"nate\ (d[=o]"n[=a]t), v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Donated}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Donating}.] [L. donatus, p. p. of donare to donate, fr. donum gift, fr. dare to give. See 2d {Date}.] To give; to bestow; to present; as, to donate fifty thousand dollars to a college. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: donated \donated\ adj. given freely especially to a cause or fund; as, the donated van made their meal-on-wheels venture possible. [WordNet 1.5]
donated adj : given freely especially to a cause or fund; "the donated van made their meal-on-wheels venture possible"
